title: Job Openings at Respected Solutions
content:
Respected Solutions is a leading pawn shop in Nigeria, providing quick and reliable loans against cars, gold, luxury watches, gadgets, and other valuables. Whether you require a loan against gold, luxury watch, jewelry, or even a against car, we provide competitive interest rates and easy repayment options. Our government approved and licensed services guarantee a secure and trustworthy borrowing experience.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Account Officer

Job Location: Ikota, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Account Officer to join our finance department.
	This is an excellent opportunity for a recent graduate or early-career professional to gain hands-on experience in a comprehensive accounting role.
	You will be instrumental in ensuring the accuracy and integrity of our financial records, contributing directly to the company's financial health and strategic decision-making.


Key Responsibilities
As an Account Officer, you will work closely with the Senior Accountant and be responsible for a range of critical duties, including:


	Bookkeeping & General Ledger: Managing the daily transactions, including accounts payable and accounts receivable, and ensuring the general ledger is maintained accurately.
	Bank Reconciliation: Performing monthly reconciliation of bank statements to the general ledger.
	Invoice & Expense Processing: Handling all company invoicing, tracking expense reports, and processing payments to vendors and suppliers.
	Reporting: Preparing various financial reports for management, including budget-to-actual variance analysis.


Qualifications


	Education: A Bachelor's degree or Higher National Diploma (HND) in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	Experience: 2-3 years of relevant experience.
	Soft Skills: High level of attention to detail, strong organizational skills, and excellent written and verbal communication.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, especially Excel (e.g., pivot tables, VLOOKUPs).
	Proximity to the location (Ikota) is key.


Salary
N180,000 - N250,000 per month. 

Application Closing Date: 10th November, 2025. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: talent@respectedsolution.co using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Legal Associate

Job Location: Ikota, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Draft, review, and interpret legal documents, contracts, and agreements
	Conduct legal research and provide sound advice to management
	Ensure compliance with statutory requirements and corporate governance
	Represent the company in legal matters where necessary
	Liaise with external solicitors, regulatory bodies, and other stakeholders
	Maintain accurate records of all legal documentation and correspondence


Requirements


	LL.B Degree and BL from a recognized institution
	1–3 years of post-call experience in a corporate or law firm environment
	Strong knowledge of corporate and commercial law
	Excellent communication, analytical, and drafting skills
	High level of integrity, professionalism, and attention to detail
	Must reside around Ikota, Lekki–Ajah or its environs (proximity is essential).


Salary
N300,000 - 400,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 10th November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: talent@respectedsolution.co using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Driver

Job Location: Ikota Axis, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a reliable and experienced Driver to join our team.
	The ideal candidate must be familiar with Lagos roads, possess excellent driving skills, and reside within close proximity to Ikota Axis for prompt availability.


Key Responsibilities


	Safely transport staff, goods, or materials to and from assigned locations
	Maintain the cleanliness and proper functioning of the vehicle
	Follow traffic rules and company driving policies at all times
	Perform routine checks and notify management of any maintenance needs
	Ensure timely pick-ups and drop-offs
	Maintain accurate records of trips and fuel usage


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE or equivalent
	At least 3 years of driving experience in Lagos
	Valid Driver’s License and LASDRI
	Must have good knowledge of Lagos roads, especially the Lekki-Ajah axis
	Clean driving record and good references
	Must be punctual, reliable, and presentable
	Proximity to Ikota Axis is a key requirement


Salary
N130,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 14th November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: talent@respectedsolution.co using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at BrandCo Nigeria Limited
content:
BrandCo's core focus is to identify high-street brands that appeal to the urban African consumer and offer these through world class retail experiences. We take time to understand a brand's offering and how it can be tailored to consumer's shopping habits and preferences in our target markets.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Head of Commercial

Job Location: Lagos

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a dynamic and strategic Head, Commercial to drive revenue growth, optimize profitability, and oversee the entire commercial function within our retail operations.
	This individual will be responsible for crafting and executing commercial strategies, building strong customer and partner relationships, and leading a high-performing team.
	The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in the retail industry and a proven track record of delivering results with minimal supervision.


Key Responsibilities
Strategic Commercial Leadership:


	Develop and implement the commercial strategy aligned with the company’s overall goals and objectives.
	Identify growth opportunities across product lines, market segments, and distribution channels.


Sales and Revenue Management:


	Drive sales growth by developing innovative sales plans and promotional strategies.


Monitor and analyze sales performance metrics to ensure targets are met or exceeded.


	Oversee pricing strategies to maintain competitiveness and profitability.


Customer Relationship Management:


	Build and nurture strong relationships with key customers, partners, and stakeholders.
	Ensure exceptional customer satisfaction by aligning commercial operations with customer needs.


Product and Category Management:


	Collaborate with product teams to determine optimal product assortments and pricing strategies.
	Monitor product performance and trends to inform inventory decisions and promotional campaigns.


Team Leadership:


	Lead and mentor the commercial team, including sales, marketing, and category managers, to achieve objectives.
	Foster a culture of accountability, innovation, and performance excellence.


Market and Competitor Analysis:


	Conduct regular market research to understand industry trends, customer preferences, and competitor activities.
	Use insights to refine commercial strategies and identify new opportunities.


Budget and Financial Management:


	Prepare and manage the commercial budget, ensuring cost-effective operations.
	Analyze financial reports to assess profitability and adjust strategies as needed.
	Develop and manage the supply chain budget, focusing on cost optimization while maintaining quality and service levels.
	Implement cost-reduction strategies across the supply chain without compromising performance or customer satisfaction.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred).
	At least 8+ years of experience in a senior commercial role within the retail industry.
	Proven track record of driving revenue growth and profitability in a retail environment.
	Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire and lead cross-functional teams.
	Expertise in sales, marketing, category management, and pricing strategies.
	Excellent negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make informed decisions.
	Experience with retail management systems and customer relationship management tools is an advantage.


Key Competencies:


	Strategic Thinking and Business Acumen
	Leadership and Team Development
	Customer-Centric Approach
	Financial and Analytical Skills
	Innovation and Problem-Solving
	Strong Communication and Negotiation Skills.


Application Closing Date: 14th November, 2025.

Click here to apply online

 

2.) Sales Associate

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Overview


	The primary responsibility is to provide exceptional customer service while driving revenue growth for the company. 
	He/ She will be expected to effectively utilize data and adhere to company policies to optimize sales performance. 
	The role will also involve continuous training to enhance your knowledge of products, services, and brand guidelines.


Key Responsibilities


	Create memorable shopping experiences for customers through effective engagement and exceptional customer service aimed at driving sales, achieving customer satisfaction, and improvingcustomer retention.
	Promote brand and product awareness/loyalty by gaining and utilizing a comprehensive understanding of brand knowledge and technical knowledge of the products.
	Execute promotions, marketing campaigns, and activities in-store to drive sales and promote customer loyalty.
	Maintain product placement and visualmerchandising standards in line with set guidelines.
	Drives sales to achieve set financial and performance targets.
	Data gathering: Gather accurate market data; customer information, feedback, trends, demographics, and sales data to drive market analysisand inform business decisions.
	Monitor inventory levels and stock accuracyacross product categoriastomaximize sale opportunities and prevent shrinkage.

Job Overview


	A Retail Store Manager is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of a retail store, ensuring smooth business processes, maximizing sales, and delivering excellent customer service.

Job Responsibilities
Sales & Revenue Growth:


	Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve store targets.
	Analyze sales performance and identify areas for improvement.
	Implement promotions, discounts, and marketing campaigns to drive sales. 
	Monitor competitor pricing and market trends. 


Customer Experience & Service Excellence:


	Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through exceptional service.
	Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and escalations professionally.
	Train staff in customer service best practices.
	Maintain a welcoming and engaging store environment. 


Team Leadership & Staff Management:


	Recruit, train, and mentor sales associates.
	Schedule shifts and manage staff productivity.
	Conduct performance reviews and provide feedback.
	Foster a team-oriented culture with clear communication. 


Inventory & Stock Management:


	Ensure adequate stock levels and timely replenishment.
	Monitor and reduce stock shrinkage (theft, damage, mismanagement).
	Coordinate with suppliers and warehouse teams for deliveries.
	Implement inventory control measures to optimize stock turnover. 


Store Operations & Compliance:


	Maintain store cleanliness, organization, and visual merchandising standards.
	Ensure compliance with company policies, safety regulations, and operational SOPs.
	Oversee cash handling, POS operations, and daily sales reconciliation.
	Conduct regular store audits and resolve operational issues. 


Reporting & Business Analysis


	Generate sales, inventory, and customer reports for management.

	Provide insights and recommendations to improve store performance.
